---
title: "Plot 2"
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(ggplot2)

# Load the dataset
data <- read.csv("./data/cardata.csv")

# Create a box plot for Selling_Price organized by Year
ggplot(data, aes(x = as.factor(Year), y = Selling_Price)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "Box Plot of Selling Prices of Cars by Year",
       x = "Year",
       y = "Selling Price") +
  theme_minimal()
```
